text: Loka ho! Eka udaharana dile jata ahe, jara laksapurvaka aika. Allahakherija tumhi jyanna jyanna (upasya samajuna) pukarata rahila ahata, te eka masi dekhila nirmana karu sakata nahi. Jara sarvacya sarva ekatra hotila, kimbahuna jara masi yancyakaduna ekhadi vastu ghe'una palela tara he tya vastula ticyakaduna hiravuna ghe'u sakata nahi. Motha kamakuvata ahe maganara ani khupa dubala ahe to jyacyakade magitale jata ahe
